name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Persana: AI on LinkedIn & B2B Contact Info

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prospect at scale with AI messaging, people/company insights, verified contact info on LinkedIn & Gmail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔥🚀 Supercharge Your Prospecting for Free with Persana AI and 10x Your Results! 🎯💼

Are you tired of spending endless hours on LinkedIn outreach, struggling to keep conversations organized and find crucial prospect information? We understand the challenges, and that's why we've developed Persana AI - the ultimate solution to revolutionize your LinkedIn prospecting journey. ✨💪

⚡ Find Verified Emails with Persana AI - Find verified emails for free while browsing on LinkedIn

📨 Generate Personalized Messaging: With just one click, Persana AI empowers you to create highly personalized messages with AI on Gmail and LinkedIn tailored to each prospect. 📩🎯

📈 Save LinkedIn profile information straight to HubSpot so you and your team never miss those leads 💼

⚡ ChatGPT for Prospect-Specific Questions: Need specific information about your prospect? Persana AI integrates ChatGPT directly into the Chrome extension! 💬💡

📈 Instant Prospect and Company Insights: Persana AI delivers lightning-fast insights right at your fingertips. Discover key details about prospects and companies in a snap - latest industry trends, notable achievements, or any other valuable information. Stay informed and make every interaction count! 📈💼

🚩 The Problem: LinkedIn outreach can be a time-consuming and arduous task, hindering your productivity and hampering growth. But fear not! We're here to streamline your process and boost your success.

🚀 Persana's Solution: Download Persana AI, the game-changing Chrome extension designed specifically for LinkedIn outreach. Here's how it works:

1️⃣ Add Your Company and Ideal Customer Profile: Provide a few details about your company and the specific types of prospects you're targeting, such as software engineers, CPOs, HR managers, or even for recruitment purposes.

2️⃣ Generate Personalized LinkedIn Messages: Effortlessly create tailored messages for each prospect with our one-click messaging generation feature. Save time and make a lasting impact!

3️⃣ Access Instant Insights: Enjoy instant access to vital prospect and company insights, including industry trends, notable achievements, and any other information that can help you stand out in your outreach efforts.

👋 Who is it for:

Sales teams seeking to streamline their LinkedIn outreach process
Professionals desiring quick and easy personalized messaging solutions
Recruiters looking to identify and engage with top talent on LinkedIn
Individuals and teams in need of instant insights on prospects and companies
Download Persana AI today and witness the transformation in your LinkedIn prospecting. It's time to take control and achieve unparalleled success! 🌟🔥
